# Press <u>Alt/Option + F</u>

---

```{r eval=FALSE}
emperors %>%
  count(cause) %>%
  arrange(n) %>%
  mutate(cause = fct_inorder(cause)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = n, y = cause)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(
    aes(label = n, x = n - .25),
    color = "white",
    size = 5,
    hjust = 1
  ) +
  cowplot::theme_minimal_vgrid(16) +
  theme(
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "none"
  ) +
  xlab("number of emperors")
```
